items.headline: A U.K. retailer is having its worst day ever as PwC-audited company said it overstated profits.
items.summary_en: WH Smith shares saw their worst day on record on Thursday after the retailer said it overstated profits in its North American arm.

items.headline: Hedge-fund favorites are beating the market — and for the first time in three years, Tesla’s one of them.
items.summary_en: The favorite stocks of hedge funds have outperformed the broader market this year, and for the first time since 2022, Tesla is one of them, an analysis from Goldman Sachs found.
